name: Alec Bradley - Double Broadleaf - Chunk
additionalNotes: The third release in the Alec Bradley Experimental Series, Double Broadleaf features proprietary wrapper and binder tobacco from heritage Connecticut Broadleaf seeds grown in the rich soils of Honduras. These exclusive tobaccos are then blended with an additional binder from Nicaragua and filler tobaccos from Honduras and Nicaragua to create a bold, rich, and flavorful smoking experience. The creation of Double Broadleaf exemplifies what it means to be experimental.Â The Alec Bradley Double Broadleaf features a mouthwatering Honduran maduro wrapper that cloaks a dual binder made of Honduran broadleaf and Nicaraguan leaves and a Honduran and Nicaraguan filler.
